name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and butter.

name: Eggs Benedict
description: Classic eggs Benedict with poached eggs, Canadian bacon, and hollandaise sauce.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Sliced avocado on whole grain toast, topped with cherry tomatoes and a sprinkle of sea salt.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with grilled chicken, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Club Sandwich
description: Triple-decker sandwich with turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise on toasted bread.

name: Caprese Panini
description: Fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, and basil pesto pressed between slices of ciabatta bread.

name: Iced Latte
description: Chilled espresso mixed with milk, served over ice.

name: Freshly Squeezed Orange Juice
description: Refreshing orange juice made from freshly squeezed oranges.

name: Mango Smoothie
description: Blended mangoes with yogurt and honey, served cold.
